topic.title: How to Factory Reset Yealink Phones
topic.shortdesc: Before you start to provision Yealink phones with , you need to reset Yealink phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.

body.p: This guide takes Yealink SIP-T46S running firmware 66.84.0.10 as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Press the OK key when the phone is idle or navigate to Menu Status on the phone.

Log in the phone web interface with your username and password.
username: admin
password: admin
Go to Settings Upgrade , click Reset to Factory.

Click Confirm to reset the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
